description.value: Once per encounter, assuming appropriate fire-support assets are available and the character is equipped with a marker light, they may make a +0 Ballistic Skill Test as a Full Action. If successful, 1d5 Rounds later, -1 round per Degree of Success on Test (min. 1 Round). A Seeker Missile strikes the target, dealing 3d10+5 E Damage with PEN 10.
